game.name: Solasta II
game.genres: 어드벤처, 인디, RPG, 전략, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 자막 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In a Mana-infused land, a dark force led by the enigmatic Shadwyn threatens Neokos. Bring your party of adventurers together across perilous realms in this Turn-Based Tactical RPG based on the SRD 5.2 ruleset. You make the choices, dice decide your destiny.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In a Mana-infused land, a dark force led by the enigmatic Shadwyn threatens Neokos. Bring your party of adventurers together across perilous realms in this Turn-Based Tactical RPG based on the SRD 5.2 ruleset. You make the choices, dice decide your destiny.
